name: Free Piano.
description:
Free Piano is the best sounding and most realistic piano app for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. It's a fun musical instrument that you can take with you anywhere.

11 great patches (3 are free):

- Free Grand
- E-Piano
- Harpsichord
- Grand Piano
- Clavinet
- WahWah
- Vintage Piano
- DX Piano
- Celesta
- Vibra Phone
- Marimba

With Free Piano you can play individual notes, melodies or chords. Join with a group of friends to create the ultimate Piano group. Play chords with all the fingers you've got. Slide your fingers to roll the keys. Endless hours of pure fun.
